101.comments: Note that this course is ALSO offered in term 2 and in the summer. Students may also take MATH 302.Registration information can be found here: https://www.stat.ubc.ca/undergrad-registration-info-and-faqs

201.comments: Equivalent Math 302.Please note that Stat 302 will ALSO be offered in the summer, if you are not able to secure a seat in Stat 302 during the winter terms.

202.comments: Stat 302 will also be offered in the summer for students who are not able to secure a seat in Stat 302 during the winter  terms..Students may also enroll in Math 302 instead.

WL1.comments: BEFORE REGISTERING ON THE WAIT LIST, PLEASE READ THE REGISTRATION INFORMATION AND FAQs https://www.stat.ubc.ca/undergrad-registration-info-and-faqs Registration on the waitlist does not guarantee a seat in the course.

WL2.comments: BEFORE REGISTERING ON THE WAIT LIST, PLEASE READ THE REGISTRATION INFORMATION AND FAQs https://www.stat.ubc.ca/undergrad-registration-info-and-faqs Registration on the waitlist does not guarantee a seat in the course.STUDENTS ON THIS WAIT LIST WILL BE MOVED INTO THE SECTION IN WHICH A SEAT BECOMES AVAILABLE FIRST

description: Basic notions of probability, random variables, expectation and conditional expectation, limit theorems. (Consult the Credit Exclusion list within the Faculty of Science section in the Calendar.)
